org.apache.flink.client.cli

接口 CustomCommandLine<ClusterType extends ClusterClient>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultCLI

    public interface CustomCommandLine<ClusterType extends ClusterClient>
    Custom command-line interface to load hooks for the command-line interface.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addGeneralOptions(org.apache.commons.cli.Options baseOptions)
      Adds custom options to the existing general options.
      void addRunOptions(org.apache.commons.cli.Options baseOptions)
      Adds custom options to the existing run options.
      ClusterType createCluster(String applicationName, org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine, org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config)
      Creates the client for the cluster
      String getId()
      Gets the unique identifier of this CustomCommandLine
      boolean isActive(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine, org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration configuration)
      Signals whether the custom command-line wants to execute or not
      ClusterType retrieveCluster(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine, org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config)
      Retrieves a client for a running cluster

    • 方法详细资料

      • isActive

        boolean isActive(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                 org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Signals whether the custom command-line wants to execute or not
        参数:
        commandLine - The command-line options
        configuration - The Flink configuration
        返回:
        True if the command-line wants to run, False otherwise

      • getId

        String getId()
        Gets the unique identifier of this CustomCommandLine
        返回:
        A unique identifier

      • addRunOptions

        void addRunOptions(org.apache.commons.cli.Options baseOptions)
        Adds custom options to the existing run options.
        参数:
        baseOptions - The existing options.

      • addGeneralOptions

        void addGeneralOptions(org.apache.commons.cli.Options baseOptions)
        Adds custom options to the existing general options.
        参数:
        baseOptions - The existing options.

      • retrieveCluster

        ClusterType retrieveCluster(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                            org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config)
                     throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Retrieves a client for a running cluster
        参数:
        commandLine - The command-line parameters from the CliFrontend
        config - The Flink config
        返回:
        Client if a cluster could be retrieved
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported

      • createCluster

        ClusterType createCluster(String applicationName,
                          org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                          org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config)
                   throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Creates the client for the cluster
        参数:
        applicationName - The application name to use
        commandLine - The command-line options parsed by the CliFrontend
        config - The Flink config to use
        返回:
        The client to communicate with the cluster which the CustomCommandLine brought up.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported
